title: Magic moments. Unit 3. Let's see. Lopsideland
creator_credit: Warren Brown, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Steve Wax
brief_description: Shows children the way the world would look upside-down. Provides an early lesson in looking at things from different perspectives. Suitable for primary level.
